cards.markdown:
I’ve been playing around with a few video upload sites, as I fancy doing a little more videoblogging, and want to acheive better quality than YouTube offers. A couple of sites have caught my eye, so I uploaded the same video clip to both to do a quick comparison. This one is from [blip.tv](http://blip.tv), which has nice things like an automated video podcast feed and the option to upload different versions for different players:
[![]( "Click To Play")](http://blip.tv/file/get/Adders-PortAlKantaoui680.flv) [Click To Play](http://blip.tv/file/get/Adders-PortAlKantaoui680.flv)
Views of the Tunisian town from the sea
And this is from [Vimeo](http://www.vimeo.com), whose interface is beautifully clean and simple. [Port Al Kantaoui](http://www.vimeo.com/clip=137706) on [Vimeo](http://www.vimeo.com/) I can’t decide which I prefer…
